channel.title: Hyrule
channel.description:
for starters this is a Deltascape Based server so don't call me a pure leacher....
I added home is now in lumby
Custom items
custom training areas
redid most shops
max lvl is now 160, 126 per skill faster xp rate
custom help menue a helpful guide in the home area
CUSTOM CLAN WARS
CUSTOM SMITHING;
on deltascape source you smith money but on my server you smith items. CUSTOM WAYS TO MAKE GOD SWORDS like GLOWWING DAGGER + HOLY FORCE = Saradomin Godsword
Added barrows items as drops for the barrows brothers
CUSTOM WAY to start crafting salve Shard + gold ring = ring of Wealth npcs are moved around
Custstom commands; ::food ::train ::shout ( ::yell incorages spammers ::shout nocks spammers back down) ::help ::client (link to client DL, its not up-to-date so u have to upput the new client and so forwth) ::fally ::varrock ::wildmine ::dragons ::pk ::magic ::aglity ( wilderness one ) ::rules ::kbd ::mithdrg ::ardy ::owned ::starter ::max ::noclip is fixed it sends a global message calling the person a cheater, it works for me ;) ::players ::master gives 200m xp now ====== i redid GFX on some spells
Theres a holiday already set up just spawn Santa
I fixed Arymdyl, santa, and other armour to go in right spots
I started working on the Grand Exhange and Clan chat but never finished it thats why theres the base codes for them...
Theres a lot more to be found in this server...
http://uppit.com/A7UIU8
http://uppit.com/A7UIU8
[code]http://uppit.com/A7UIU8[/code]
Theres EVERYTHING I used in the server so its not just the server, it comes with the client and ECT. also
i don't care if u DL but can tell me what you think of it?????
CREDITS- Delta mopar/other sites Tutorials me my friends who helped me Jagex
sorry theres no pics. =))
=================================================================================[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2008, 01:08:19 pm[/size][hr]also this is great for begginers b/c it has everthing set up :)

item.title: Hyrule
item.dc:creator: @miah102 miah102
item.description:
@miah102 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:3, topic:247474”]You are a leecher.
Just because you changed things doesn’t mean you didn’t leech.

This is basically what you did.

#1: EDITED codes in the server. = Leech.
#2: Made only a few commands, still the same source = Leech.
So basically this isn’t your source.[/quote]
If you change anything is not a leech. sorry man but your wrong…

Read full topic

item.title: Hyrule

leave the guy alone tony

Why should he when he has 100% valid points?
[/quote]

Because he leeches too, just like you do, so stop being a hypocrite…[/quote]
Everyone leeches, you do, everyone does, and at what point did I say I leeched?

Read full topic

item.description:
@thrystascape wrote:

for starters this is a Deltascape Based server so don’t call me a pure leacher…

I added home is now in lumby

Custom items

custom training areas

redid most shops

max lvl is now 160, 126 per skill
faster xp rate

custom help menue
a helpful guide in the home area

CUSTOM CLAN WARS

on deltascape source you smith money but on my server you smith items.

Added barrows items as drops for the barrows brothers

npcs are moved around

i redid GFX on some spells

Theres a holiday already set up just spawn Santa

I fixed Arymdyl, santa, and other armour to go in right spots

I started working on the Grand Exhange and Clan chat but never finished it thats why theres the base codes for them…
